name: HSP_ACCT_EBC_VG_OB_PX
description: Obstetric procedures for electronic birth certificate extract. This table is a new version of HSP_ACCT_EBC_OB_PX, geared toward the 2003 standard for reporting birth information. This item is based on options allowed in birth information form version G from the state of Hawaii.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the hospital account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: OBST_PX_C_NAME
columns.description: The obstetric procedures category ID for Electronic Birth Certificate information.
